name: Sword (Game Garbage)
description:
You spend your entire life waving that sword of yours around. And one day, it breaks. What do you do? Find a new one of course! But where?

Sword is a short micro rpg game that is more based around exploration. Venture through a small in game world one grid at a time. With 1bit graphics Inspired by MINIT.

CREDITS:
"hmm" sounds by Jay Tholen - https://twitter.com/jaytholen
SFX by ChipTone - https://sfbgames.com/chiptone
Made with rpg maker vx ace
